review: The waitresses and waiters are unassuming and friendly.  The wraps that I usaully get are usually quite tasty and cooked very well.  They fill my drinks regularly.  It seems to be fairly popular during lunch time.  There is a nice family atmosphere during both lunch and dinner.  The staff seems younger than other Applebees that I've been to.  Once I had to get takeout.  It went smoothly.
The staff Today were friendly and efficient , our server irwin did a great job and the food was excellent , compared to other applebee's ,   this one is great!!!

This place could do a lot better, the food was average, the service was average, nothing really stands out at this location.  I have had better food and service for much less. I wold think again before coming to the place again.
